attributes.action: Responsibly support the petitions webs site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is evident even at first glance that this web site is currently being used to allow the government put up a facade that they are interested in what people think.

It is evident that any attempt to portay a view not in keeping with that of the incumbent government will be either rejected with no given reason or removed completely.

1. Does this government believe in free 
speech? 

2. Does this government really wish to display that it is in the slightest part interested in what people think?

I petition the government to provide REAL evidence of either of the above.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
